title: Running high: a story of pain and joy ...
creator_credit: Gus Howard and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Novices and champions prepare for, and run the 1983 Festival City Marathon. Robert de Castella intersperses candid interviews with his marathon running philosophy and techniques. Discusses the exhilaration of personal improvement, the disappointment of hitting the wall and the reasons behind the increasing popularity of running throughout the world.
